column1: Art Institute of Chicago////If you love museums
column2: you MUST go here.  Location is perfect.  Right in the center of the city.  Walking distance from many places.  You can't possibly see everything here in one visit.  I would love to spend a few days here!  So much art work and all kinds.  I think the entry fee is reasonable because the place is huge and there is so much.  A must do when you are in Chicago.
